title: Pocket Monsters: Ruby-Sapphire-hen
original_name: ポケットモンスター R・S（ルビー サファイア）編
sinopse:
In Ruby-Sapphire, Clefairy will make you laugh hilariously! Accompanied by Red, Clefairy meets with all sorts of problems on its travels entertained by all the silly ideas it comes up with to solve them!!!

(Source: Chuang-Yi)
